name: VR RETRO SNAKE ON GIRLS
description:
Everyone should have played the classic retro snake game. This is a game that took the world by storm in the 1990s. VR RETRO SNAKE ON GIRLS is a brand new snake game. Have a VR immersive experience. Each level has different challenges. Through eating fruits, playing football, etc., you can clear the level with points. After the level is successfully cleared, you can unlock new content. Each level has a different surprise picture waiting for you to unlock it.

The operation is very simple:
Use the handle trigger button to select the menu.
After entering the game, the snake will move to where the player is looking.
